comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool.This contract is a multi-year contract. The consultant shall conduct Additional Delineation, Data Gap Analylsis and Update to Environmental Risk Assessment at the London Airport, London, Ontario, and Developement of a Workplan to Conduct an Off-site Risk Assessment for perfluorinated chemicals (PFCs) at the Hamilton International Airport, Hamilton, Ontario.
